import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, CardBody, Button, InputGroupAddon, Label, FormGroup, CustomInput } from 'reactstrap'; import { AvForm, AvField, AvGroup, AvInput, AvFeedback } from 'availity-reactstrap-validation'; import PageTitle from '../../components/PageTitle'; const FormValidation = () => { return (

Bootstrap Validation - Normal

Provide valuable, actionable feedback to your users with HTML5 form validation–available in all our supported browsers.

@ Please choose a username.

Bootstrap Validation (Tooltips)

Provide valuable, actionable feedback to your users with HTML5 form validation–available in all our supported browsers.

This is an error! This is an error!
@ Please choose a username.
This is an error! This is an error! This is an error! ); }; export default FormValidation;
